attributes.action: Only the people born here pay tax here the immigrants pay tax to own country and are not entitled to any of our services or benefits
attributes.additional_details: Immigrants are taxed but the money goes to their country in return any benefits are charged to that country example operation send the bill to there country because the tax they pay here out ways the benefits they recieve education tax credits. So let them keep the tax they will still spend money here in our economy  buses rail but our costs won't rise as they will or there government will have to pay that will stop a lot travelling here as there country won't like that  man pays tax on 300 pounds then sends four kids to school we are funding this  so stop taxing them and they get nothing from us
